head.citation-title: Signal Processing - Algorithms, Architectures, Arrangements, and Applications Conference Proceedings, SPA
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 70 papers. The topics discussed include: probabilistic and unsupervised machine learning for auditory data and pattern recognition; forward error correction in wireless communication systems for industrial application; test signals used in electroacoustics and speech technology; Petrovsky, design and implementation of reversible integer quaternionic paraunitary filter banks on adder-based distributed arithmetic; implementation of DIFAR processing in ASW dipping sonar; simultaneous mutual localization of transmitters and receivers from time difference of arrival measurements; comparison of selected electroencephalographic signal classification methods; influence of sEMG electrode matrix configuration on hand gesture recognition performance; localisation method for sEMG electrode array, towards hand gesture recognition HMI development; towards sensor position-invariant hand gesture recognition using a mechanomyographic interface; design of an active noise controller for reduction of tire/road interaction noise in environmentally friendly vehicles; analysis of signal of X8 unmanned aerial vehicle; a novel objective function based on a generalized Kelly criterion for deep learning; rule-based data-driven approach for computer aided diagnosis of the peripheral zone prostate cancer from multiparametric MRI: proof of concept; reconstruction of high-resolution T2W MR images of the prostate using Maximum A Posteriori Approach and Markov Random Field regularization; and the coarse and fine granular fault tolerance techniques in FPGA-based Processors.

translated-sourcetitle.$: Signal Processing - Algorithms, Architectures, Arrangements, and Applications Conference Proceedings, SPA
